subject: Fix runtime bugs in website_rag_crawler workflow
description:
Fix two runtime bugs found during live testing:
1. $env.TAVILY_API_KEY blocked in HTTP Request node expressions - move API key resolution to Code node
2. $workflow.staticData undefined in primary_evaluate - eliminate staticData, use $() node references
Apply fixes via n8n_update_partial_workflow to workflow 8t6QnPUcIjx4PaF2
activeForm: Fixing runtime bugs in crawler workflow
